attributes.action: Ban the media from using Coronavirus as clickbait
attributes.additional_details: If they stop causing panic over this issue in two weeks time we’ll all be wondering what the fuss was about and businesses will be able to get back to normal
attributes.background: Force the media to only report on coronavirus virus if there is any new advice from the government

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of the media. 

Newspapers are regulated by the Independent Press Standards Organisation.  You can find out more about IPSO here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/

Broadcast media is regulated by Ofcom. You can find out more here:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/home
